com.redhat.rhn.frontend.events
Class SsmInstallPackagesEvent

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.rhn.frontend.events.SsmInstallPackagesEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventMessage
public class SsmInstallPackagesEvent
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventMessage

Event fired to carry the information necessary to schedule package installations on systems in the SSM.

Constructor Summary

          Creates a new event to install a set of packages on systems in the SSM.

Constructor Detail

SsmInstallPackagesEvent

public SsmInstallPackagesEvent(java.lang.Long userIdIn,
                               java.util.Date earliestIn,
                               java.util.Set<java.lang.String> packagesIn,
                               java.lang.Long channelIdIn)
Creates a new event to install a set of packages on systems in the SSM.

Parameters:
userIdIn - user making the changes; cannot be null
earliestIn - earliest time to perform the installation; can be null
packagesIn - set of package IDs being installed; cannot be null
channelIdIn - identifies the channel the packages are installed from; cannot be null
